title: Fizz Buzz
description: Given an integer n, return a string array answer (1-indexed) where: answer[i] == "FizzBuzz" if i is divisible by 3 and 5. answer[i] == "Fizz" if i is divisible by 3. answer[i] == "Buzz" if i is divisible by 5. answer[i] == i (as a string) if none of the above conditions are true.   Example 1: Input: n = 3 Output: ["1","2","Fizz"] Example 2: Input: n = 5 Output: ["1","2","Fizz","4","Buzz"] Example 3: Input: n = 15 Output: ["1","2","Fizz","4","Buzz","Fizz","7","8","Fizz","Buzz","11","Fizz","13","14","FizzBuzz"]   Constraints: 1 <= n <= 104
